title: Artichoke mini quiches
ingredients: ['175g (6 oz) tinned artichoke hearts', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, peeled and minced', '8 eggs, lightly beaten', '115g (4 oz) grated Cheddar', '115g (4 oz) grated Gruyere', '150g (5 oz) grated Parmesan', 'small bunch fresh parsley, roughly chopped', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh tarragon', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 dash chilli sauce, such as Tabasco', '1 dash Worcestershire sauce', '4 tablespoons dried breadcrumbs']
